question:
Through ________ antics that flouted the conventions of the establishment, the Yippies of the late 1960s impressed themselves into the public consciousness; their behavior culminated in the instigation of riots in Chicago during the Democratic convention in 1968. ​
Two Answers
A. fastidious
B. socialist
C.  brazen
D. anarchist
E. communist
F. insolent
